title: Skarner 59% win rate
body: been a long time we didn't have a broken champ like that

replies.body: Except for Vayne who has that same win rate in masters tier for the last 2 months.
I've been saying this forever... He's always been good.
He's getting hot-fixed, probably next Monday.

> [{quoted}](name=Sylian,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=G2mhIJm5,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-08-22T18:41:45.878+0000)
>
> He's getting hot-fixed, probably next Monday.

i hope so
Then you have vayne with 3x his daily pick rate and still above 50 percent. Skarner is currently broken but he isn't the only one.

> [{quoted}](name=sickxapples,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=G2mhIJm5,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-08-22T18:28:23.451+0000)
>
> Then you have vayne with 3x his daily pick rate and still above 50 percent. Skarner is currently broken but he isn't the only one.

yea he has 3% pick rate that's right

Also all yhe Devourer junglers are broken, maybe some problems come by some items.

In Skarner the early W and the damage of his E are the first thing to turn down.
They keep nit-picking away small changes for MF, while allowing other champs to be straight hard buffed into 60 percent win rates
